entries.journal_entry_description: You have located a terminal on the bridge of the crashed Old Republic cruiser but its circuit boards are destroyed. You will have to salvage some more circuit boards from around the crash site to replace the damaged ones.
entries.task00_item_name: All the circuit boards have been removed already. Damaged terminal
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: Sift through the ship's debris and see if you can locate another terminal with good circuit boards to replace the damaged ones.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: The Salvage Bandits in the area probably removed the circuit boards from the terminal. Search them until you find the four you need.
entries.task02_item_name: The view screen flickers briefly and then comes to life.
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: Now that you have the four circuit boards, return to the ship's bridge and attach them to the terminal.
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: Access the now operational computer and try to find any information you can about increasing the power output of the mining facility.
